description:
From a S24O to the Baja divide, this seat pack is a key piece in your bikepacking tool box. The waterproof design protects your stuff through the inevitable rain storms. By using a roll closure, the bag can be expanded or made smaller to adapt to your gear. When securing your load, the air purge valve allows you to get a wiggle-free ride, and elastic cords and daisy chains let clip your mug or small items on.

  • Waterproof polyurethane-coated nylon ripstop fabric
  • IP64 waterproof rating is good for rainy weather
  • Adjustable hook-and-loop mounting straps and locking clips for a perfect fit
  • Air purge valve helps compress your equipment
  • Compression straps keep the load nice and tight
  • Internal stiffener adds stability
  • Highly reflective 3M scotchlite patches
  • Volume adjusts from 7 to 11L (small), 8 to 16.5L (large)
  • Can be used with carbon seatpost
name: Ortlieb Bikepacking Seat Pack
